Name: CustomFiltering
Description:
Custom filtering behavior
This example demonstrates how to create custom filtering behavior for the ComboBox. 
Typing numbers in the ComboBox filters the items lenght. For example type 12.

[//]:

Name: DropDownWithAddNewItem
Description:
DropDown with AddNewItem button

This example demonstrates how to display AddNewItem button inside dropdown of an editable ComboBox. If the user enters a value that is not available in the dropdown list, he could add it to the Items collection through this button.

[//]:

Name: DropDownWithHeaders
Description:
Drop down with headers
This example demonstrates how to display the items in the ComboBox drop down with headers. 
The approach uses a GridView inside of the Editable and NonEditable Templates.

[//]:
KeyWords: DropDownWithHeaders, gridview, drop, down, editable, noneditable, combobox

Name: EditableTextBoxTemplate
Description:
How to display more than 1 property in editable mode
This example demonstrates how to display more than one property in the TextBox of an editable ComboBox. Only one of them, bound to the DisplayMemberPath property, will be editable, all others will be read-only, in the example they are marked with different color.

[//]:

Name: SelectedItemsBinding
Description:
Selected Items Binding
This example demonstrates how to bind the selected items of the RadComboBox control to a property in your ViewModel class.

[//]:

Name: ShowToolTipOnTrimmedText
Description:
Show Tooltip On Trimmed Text
This example explains how to show a tooltip for the trimmed text by setting the ComboBoxToolTipHelper.ShowToolTipOnTrimmedText attached property.

More details can be found in our online help:
http://docs.telerik.com/devtools/wpf/controls/radcombobox/howto/show-tooltip-on-trimmed-text

[//]:
